thread.title: Students Injured In Ellis County School Bus Crash
thread.title_full: Students Injured In Ellis County School Bus Crash

author: CBS Dallas / Fort Worth
title: Students Injured In Ellis County School Bus Crash
text:
Students Injured In Ellis County School Bus Crash February 14, 2017 8:01 AM 
Follow KRLD: Facebook | Twitter 
ELLIS COUNTY (1080 KRLD) – Emergency responders are on the scene of an accident involving a school bus with several students on board. 
According to Ellis County officials, due to the rain the bus went off the road east of I-45 on Zmolek Rd and ended up in the ditch on the way to school early Tuesday morning. 
A total of seven children, the school bus driver and a bus monitor were on board. Two of the kids were taken to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries. 
The cause is under investigation. No other cars were involved. 
*This is a developing story. Follow 1080 KRLD for the latest information.
